text:
A minor tweak to build.xml - there are two project.xml files, but at present 
printable_project.xml is not used.

The patch to follow changes the projectFile attribute for the printable-docs 
anakia task.

In the long-run, this should make it easier to maintain the two sets of 
documentation (I'm hoping to refactor and simplify the VSL files one day...)
creator: tjsb@slb.com

text:
Created attachment 7014
Change projectFile for printable_docs in build.xml
creator: tjsb@slb.com
